d:
Author & Artist - Airandou

Genres - Genres - Doujinshi, Hentai, Adult, Incest, Romance, Smut, Incest, Loli, Oppai Loli, Little Sister, Nakadashi, Ahegao, Defloration, Master-Servant play, Collar, Anal, Anal Intercourse, Blow Job, Rimjob, Inseki, Twin Tails, Dog Girl, Pet Play, Tail Plug, Gokkun, Randoseru, Kemonomimi, Female Protagonist, Smegma, Hot Pants, Sweating, Moral Degeneration,

Plot - ANZU HAS A BIG BROTHER WITH WHOM SHE DOESN'T PARTICULARLY GET ALONG WITH. THEY DON'T SPEAK MORE THAN NECESSARY. ONE MIGHT EVEN SAY THEY'RE AN AVERAGE PAIR OF SIBLINGS. ANZU IS AN INTROVERT AND DOESN'T STAND OUT IN CLASS. HER BIG BROTHER, UNLIKE HER, IS CHARMING AND SEEMS TO HAVE EVEN CAPTIVATED THE HEARTS OF HER CLASSMATES.
ONE DAY, AFTER BEING ROPED INTO IT, ANZU ASKS HER BIG BROTHER IF HE HAS A GIRLFRIEND. HE DENIES HAVING ONE AND MENTIONS THAT HE LOVES ANZU AND THAT'S WHY HE'S NOT ON THE PROWL FOR A GIRLFRIEND. ANZU IS STILL UNABLE TO PROCESS HER BROTHER'S DECLARATION WHEN HE KISSES HER. AFTER GROPING ANZU, THEIR MOTHER SUDDENLY ARRIVES. HE LETS GO AND TELLS ANZU THAT HE'S SERIOUS AND EXPECTS AN ANSWER LATER THAT DAY.
